## auth.Api.token() method

Retrieves the authentication token. Only available to trusted clients.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
token(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the current access token.

## Example


```
const token = sdk.auth.token();
```
